info.name: generate_xml_content_from_chidlren
info.description: Generates for the parent xml the ioputs of the children that are externally connected. It also completes the graph tag with similar content.

input.name: xml_files
input.description: It is provided all the xml files of the source_path directory and its subdirectories.

output.name: updated_xml_files
output.description: It saves the updated xml files.

output.name: error_msgs
output.description: It prints an error msg when there are multiple ioputs with the same name on a folder.
